summary: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.
cast: Daniel Radcliffe|Lee Cormie|Christian Byers|James Fraser|Jack Thompson|Teresa Palmer|Sullivan Stapleton|Victoria Hill|Max Cullen|Kris McQuade|Ralph Cotterill|Frank Gallacher|Paul Blackwell|Judi Farr|Carmel Johnson|Carole-Anne Fooks|Rory Walker|Suzie Wilks|Michael Norman|Mike Welton|Kobe Donaldson|Julian Jones|Andy McPhee|Laura Weston|Kasey Willson|Susie Struth|Anna Westley
title: Los chicos de diciembre
